attributes.action: Make all pubs deliver food and drink to boost the economy
attributes.background: Occasionally I fancy real food but don't want to cook. I have just had a brilliant steak baguette, chips and onions rings delivered from a pub that also delivers Sunday dinners, daily specials and alcohol. Pure genius. Sign this petition do have this advised to all pubs to boost the economy & shit

rejection.details: This would be a decision for individual pubs to make, not a matter for the Government or Parliament.
